overview: He`s the bright-eyed, ever-energetic blond haired cherub from downtown Prague, who has won a whole legion of dedicated hardcore fans with his top-notch appetite for hard cock and hungry ass! His biggest fans of all, however, are the boys who get to enjoy his insatiable sexual appetite for themselves - lads like Kris Blent, Leo Ocean and Roman Smid, who just can`t wait to fuck around with their favourite horned-up young punk. Needless to say, with young Mannix in the frame, it`s a guaranteed spunk-fest each and every time!
title: Let's Play With Ray Mannix
